My name is Eyayaw Beze, and I am a PhD candidate at the [University of Duisburg-Essen](https://www.uni-due.de/en/index.php). My research areas are urban and regional economics, with a particular focus on housing markets issues. Besides, I am highly interested in data science with `R` and `Python`.
